summary: In a recent bankruptcy auction, the pharmaceutical company Regeneron acquired the majority of 23andMe's business for a total of $256 million. This acquisition includes a significant portion of 23andMe's genetic data and related assets. The deal signifies a strategic move by Regeneron to expand its presence in the genetic testing and personalized medicine market. By acquiring 23andMe's business, Regeneron gains access to a vast database of genetic information that can be used for research and drug development purposes. This acquisition is expected to enhance Regeneron's capabilities in leveraging genetic data to develop
title: 23andMe (and Your Genetic Data) Sold to Regeneron in Bankruptcy Auction

summary: Blue Origin's upcoming crew for their space mission will consist of entrepreneurs and business figures, following the recent mission that included Katy Perry and Lauren Sánchez. The focus of this next mission seems to be on individuals from the business world, highlighting their contributions and achievements. This shift in crew composition suggests a broader approach to showcasing different sectors and industries in space exploration. The inclusion of entrepreneurs and founders indicates a diverse group of individuals who will have the opportunity to experience space travel. title: Blue Origin's next crew includes entrepreneurs and founders. Here's who's following Katy Perry and Lauren Sánchez into space.
